Translate.name: business.asset.order.public.meeting.subscriber
Translate.label: 通知预订人
Translate.zh_content: 预订了{DATE}的 {DETAIL_LABEL}会议室。

Translate.name: business.asset.order.public.meeting.cancle.self
Translate.label: 取消预订通知自己
Translate.zh_content: 取消了已预订{DATE}的 {DETAIL_LABEL}会议室。

Translate.name: task.send.sender
Translate.label: 任务发送-发送者
Translate.zh_content: 你发给 {SENDER_LABEL} 一个内容为 {NOTE} 的任务。

Translate.name: task.send.confirm.sender
Translate.label: 任务发送审核-发送者
Translate.zh_content: 你发给 {RECEIVER_LABEL} 内容为 {NOTE} 的任务,正在由 {CONFIRMER_LABEL} 审核。\n

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.reply.message
Translate.label: 建议回复通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您回复了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.cancel.message
Translate.label: 建议取消通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您取消了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.send.message
Translate.label: 建议发送通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您给 {RECEIVER_LABEL} 发送了一条标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.read.message
Translate.label: 建议阅读通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您阅读了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.revoke.message
Translate.label: 建议撤销通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您撤销了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.process.message
Translate.label: 建议处理通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您处理了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.close.message
Translate.label: 建议关闭通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您关闭了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.forward.message
Translate.label: 建议转发通知-发送方
Translate.zh_content: 您将标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议转发给了 {HOLDER_LABEL}。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.apply.success
Translate.label: 申请审核通过
Translate.zh_content: 您的差旅费申请已经通过，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.apply.reject
Translate.label: 通知申请者申请被驳回
Translate.zh_content: 您的差旅费申请被驳回，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.apply.fail
Translate.label: 通知申请者申请未通过
Translate.zh_content: 您的差旅费申请未通过审核，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.revoke
Translate.label: 通知申请者申请被撤销
Translate.zh_content: 您的差旅费申请被撤销，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.order.success
Translate.label: 预定成功
Translate.zh_content: 您的机票预订成功，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.order.fail
Translate.label: 预订失败
Translate.zh_content: 您的机票预订失败，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.participant
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知参与者
Translate.zh_content: 您和{SENDER_LABEL}一起登记了{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.create.user
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知登记者
Translate.zh_content: 您登记了{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.create.user.pass
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知登记者审核通过
Translate.zh_content: 您在{BEGIN_DATE}至{END_DATE}这批报销单据({GROUP_CODE})中登记的报销单据已经审核通过。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.create.user.fail
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知登记者审核未通过
Translate.zh_content: 您登记的{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})审核未通过。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.create.user.cancel
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知登记者取消登记
Translate.zh_content: 您取消了{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.reimbursement.participant
Translate.label: 通知日常报销单的参与者信息
Translate.zh_content: 您和{SENDER_LABEL}一起登记了{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.reimbursement.create.user
Translate.label: 通知登记报销者
Translate.zh_content: 您登记了{BILL_DATE}的{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.reimbursement.user.cancel
Translate.label: 取消报销单据通知登记者
Translate.zh_content: 您取消了{BILL_DATE}的{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: task.send.receiver
Translate.label: 任务发送-接受者
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 发给你一个内容为 {NOTE} 的任务。\n

Translate.name: task.send.confirm.confirmer
Translate.label: 任务发送审核-审核者
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 发给 {RECEIVER_LABEL} 一个内容为 {NOTE} 的任务,需要你审核。\n

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.examine
Translate.label: 通知差旅费审核者审核
Translate.zh_content: 请您审核 {USER_LABEL} 提交的差旅费申请，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.remind
Translate.label: 提醒差旅费审核者审核
Translate.zh_content: 请您提醒 {EXAMINE_USER_LABEL} 审核 {USER_LABEL} 的差旅费申请，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.order
Translate.label: 通知预订者预定
Translate.zh_content: 请您帮助 {USER_LABEL} 预定机票，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.financial
Translate.label: 财务负责人查看差旅费申请单
Translate.zh_content: 请您查看 {USER_LABEL} 提交的差旅费申请，\n编号为 {BATCH_CODE} 。

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.examine.count
Translate.label: 审核者页面显示未审核条数
Translate.zh_content: 未审核的差旅费申请

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.order.count
Translate.label: 预定者页面显示未预定条数
Translate.zh_content: 未预定的差旅费申请

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.remind.count
Translate.label: 提醒者页面显示未提醒条数
Translate.zh_content: 未提醒的差旅费申请

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.final.count
Translate.label: 财务者页面显示财务查看条数
Translate.zh_content: 未查看差旅费申请

Translate.name: develop.finance.expense.travel.principal.count
Translate.label: 部门主管者页面显示本部门记录
Translate.zh_content: 本部门差旅费申请

Translate.name: business.asset.order.public.meeting.presider
Translate.label: 通知主持人员
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 邀请您在 {DETAIL_LABEL}会议室 主持{DATE}的会议。\n

Translate.name: business.asset.order.public.meeting.inviter
Translate.label: 通知邀请人员
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 邀请您在 {DETAIL_LABEL}会议室 参加{DATE}的会议。\n

Translate.name: business.asset.order.public.meeting.auditor
Translate.label: 通知旁听人员
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 邀请您在 {DETAIL_LABEL}会议室 旁听{DATE}的会议。\n

Translate.name: business.asset.order.public.meeting.cancle.others
Translate.label: 取消预订通知其他人员
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 取消了已预订{DATE}的 {DETAIL_LABEL}会议室。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.first.examine
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知初审者审核
Translate.zh_content: 请您审核{SENDER_LABEL}登记的{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.check
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知检查票单
Translate.zh_content: 请您检查{SENDER_LABEL}登记的{BILL_DATE}{DETAIL_TYPE_NAME}的报销单据({CODE})。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.reject.recheck
Translate.label: 日常报销-驳回重新检查
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL}驳回{CENTER_ORG}的{BEGIN_DATE}至{END_DATE}的一批报销单据({BATCH_CODE})。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.last.examine
Translate.label: 日常报销-通知终审者审核
Translate.zh_content: 请您审核{CENTER_ORG}的{BEGIN_DATE}至{END_DATE}的一批报销单据({BATCH_CODE})。

Translate.name: business.finance.expense.daily.look
Translate.label: 日常报销-查看一批报销单据
Translate.zh_content: 请您查看{CENTER_ORG}的{BEGIN_DATE}至{END_DATE}的一批报销单据({BATCH_CODE})。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.reply.notify
Translate.label: 建议回复通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 回复了您标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.read.notify
Translate.label: 建议阅读通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 阅读了您标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.revoke.notify
Translate.label: 建议撤销通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 撤销了您标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.process.notify
Translate.label: 建议处理通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 处理了您标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.close.notify
Translate.label: 建议关闭通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 关闭了您标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.forward.notify
Translate.label: 建议转发通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 将您标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议转发给了 {HOLDER_LABEL}。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.send.notify
Translate.label: 建议发送通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 给您发送了一条标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。

Translate.name: business.project.design.idea.cancel.notify
Translate.label: 建议取消通知-接收方
Translate.zh_content: {SENDER_LABEL} 取消了标题为 {TITLE_LABEL} 的建议。
